definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Ci writers often make use of the qualities of sounds to express emotions at the sight of some particular scenes or objects.
sentences.chinese: 詞人往往運用詞的聲韻特點進行狀景寄懷，託物寓情。
